about_the_game:
Samurai Pig: The Way of the Rooster is a brutal Action RPG. Tragedy has thrown the Zodiac and the very world into disarray. You are an exiled pig, who must return to the blade to protect the world. Crush rogue deities. Protect your chickens. Save your bacon.

STORY:
A darkness has overtaken and hurled the Zodiac into misalignment. You a simple pig farmer who follows the path the Rooster, exiled for you beliefs and ways. You live in a modest farm and practice the way of the chicken. Swearing off the use of blades due to a tragic past, you must must journey to face the deities that control the fate of his land.
As the last disciple of the way of the Rooster, you possess the skills and mastery to battle your way through countless hordes of brainwashed non believers, gods and demons. Embark on the journey of your life to save the chicken farm, the planet and The Way of the Rooster.



KEY FEATURES:
• Combat
Samurai Pig has deep, engaging, and enriching combat. Your skill alone is enough to defeat any peril that stands before you. A complex risk and reward system of combat with learning, mastering and accomplishment. Slash, crush, and demolish your foes with Samurai Pig-Based Combat.

• Weapons
Each upgradable weapon has its own skill set, abilities and unique characteristics that you can adapt to your desired playstyle. Defeat your foes for resources or scour the vast landscapes for upgrades.

• Armor
Samurai Pig: The Way of the Rooster universe is inhabited by gods, demons, and the animal tribes who serve them. Each armor is imbued with the power of each tribe, with unique attributes, and abilities.

• World
Fight, climb, swim, and explore the breathtaking and mysterious worlds of the god and demon animal tribes as you honor the way of the Rooster.

  • Graphics: 8 GB RAM

  • Graphics: 16 GB RAM
